Title: Hostage Situation
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Phil Augusta Jackson, Lakshmi Sundaram (executive story editor), Phil Augusta Jackson (story editor), Tricia McAlpin (story editor), Justin Noble (story editor), David Phillips (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake helps Charles reclaim the rights to his sperm from his ex-wife, Amy accidentally breaks Terry's nose after asking for a recommendation, and Gina helps interrogate a suspect who refuses to speak to anyone but her.
